description: Variation of condition 10 (in accordance with approved drawings) pursuant to planning permission 2015/3470 dated 4th January 2016 (Demolition of existing petrol filling station (Class Sui Generis) and redevelopment of the site including erection of a 4-7 storey building to provide 71 self-contained residential units (Class C3) (22 x 1 bedrooms, 41 x 2 bedrooms, 8 x 3 bedrooms) with associated cycle parking and landscaping) to allow design alterations in association with reconfigured layout of 69 units.
